Articles.Content: Subject says it all, Is there any key that open/closes the deployable ladders? Sometimes i cant click it jsut right and it wont select it > Its making me mad, so anyone know a key for it? I already tried G but that\'s still JUST landing gears. And while i\'m on this post, is there anyway to add landing gears to a rocket that\'s already out and not in? Thank you

It\'s not a key, you need to right click on them and then click the deploy button.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
The right click menu can be difficult to open sometimes. You need to be precise to get it to pop up.

Will there be a toggle key for them implemented in the future? I have them rotated around on my craft so that they extend outward instead of down, and it is practically impossible to select them to open them. In several designs of mine, it was impossible to select them. (My attempt to simulate antenna with stock parts.)
I\'m sure in the future there will be some sort of Bind or toggle to open/close ladders. KSP is still in development and will be getting more features in the future. We just have to be patient.

It doesn\'t always make sense to open/close all ladders at the same time. And the keyboard is already cramped enough as it is.

No: if the bug is fixed (i.e. ladders sometimes not focussable), then we won\'t need hotkeys anymore.

There are a couple of glitches still there. Sometimes, my crewmember looses halt of the ladder. This is not such a problem in outer space, but on gravity conditions it is.
